60100.desc: When equipped by a Royal Navy ship: increases that ship's Evasion Rate by 5.0%.
60100.name: Royal Navy Operation Report "A"

60110.desc: When equipped by a J-class DD: increases her DMG dealt to non-Royal Navy enemies by 10.0%.
60110.name: Honor of the J-Class

60120.desc: Increases AMO by 1 for the boat equipping this gear (the Submarine Fleet's AMO cap is 6.)
60120.name: Round Shot

60130.desc: When equipped by Reisalin Stout: 10s after the battle starts, performs an Item attack (DMG is based on the equipping character's FP) that inflicts a special Burn and the Item Mark debuff to enemies hit for 5s. If equipped in the second gear slot: the character equipping this gear gains a special Secondary Gun (attacks from this Secondary Gun are not treated as Item attacks).
60130.name: Inflict Burns

60140.desc: When equipped by Reisalin Stout: 15s after the battle starts, performs an Item attack (DMG is based on the equipping character's FP) that inflicts the Item Mark debuff to enemies hit for 5s and decreases their SPD by 30.0% for 5s.
60140.name: Slowdown

60150.desc: When equipped by Reisalin Stout: 20s after the battle starts, performs an Item attack (DMG is based on the equipping character's FP) that inflicts the Item Mark debuff to enemies hit for 5s and decreases their Crit Rate by 10.0% for 5s. If equipped in the third gear slot: the character equipping this gear gains a special Anti-Air Gun (attacks from this Anti-Air Gun are not treated as Item attacks).
60150.name: Senselessness

60160.desc: When equipped by Reisalin Stout: 25s after the battle starts, performs an Item attack (DMG is based on the equipping character's FP) that inflicts the Item Mark debuff to enemies hit for 5s; If "Grand Bomb," "Crystal Ice Bomb," "Laute Plajig," and "Wirbel Luft" are all equipped together: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 10.0% and activates "Core Drive - Four-Star Aurora" 30s after the battle starts.
60160.name: Maximum Wind

60170.desc: 核心驱动—四星极光技能占用
60170.name: Core Drive - Four-Star Aurora

60180.desc: When equipped by an "Atelier Ryza" collab character: 20s after the battle starts, performs an Item attack that inflicts the Item Mark debuff to enemies hit for 5s and decreases their Crit Rate by 10.0% for 5s.
60180.name: Echoing Seas

60190.desc: When equipped by an "Atelier Ryza" collab character: 30s after the battle starts, performs an Item attack that inflicts the Item Mark debuff to enemies hit for 5s and decreases their EVA by 10.0% for 5s. If "Genesis Hammer" and "Bubble Bullet" are both equipped together: 35s after the battle starts, activates "Core Drive - Gravity Press."
60190.name: Bubbly Prison

60200.desc: 核心驱动—重力挤压技能占用
60200.name: Core Drive - Gravity Press

60210.desc: When equipped by an "Atelier Ryza" collab character: 30s after the battle starts, deducts 30 HP from this ship and performs an Item attack that inflicts the Item Mark debuff to enemies hit for 5s and decreases their FP, TRP, and AVI by 3.0% for 30s.
60210.name: Soulstealer's Engraving

60220.desc: When equipped by an "Atelier Ryza" collab character: 40s after the battle starts, performs an Item attack that inflicts the Item Mark debuff to enemies hit for 5s and increases their DMG taken by 5.0% for 10s. If "Apocalypse" and "N/A" are both equipped together: activates "Core Drive - Testament Meteor" 50s after the battle starts.
60220.name: Infinite Explosion

60230.desc: 核心驱动—遗言陨石技能占用
60230.name: Core Drive - Testament Meteor

60240.desc: When equipped by an "Atelier Ryza" collab character: when the battle starts, increases all your "Atelier Ryza" collab characters' Evasion Rate by 3.0% for 50s. If "Mystic Robe" and "Elixir" are both equipped together: when the battle starts, activates "Core Drive - Angelic Embrace" and deploys barriers around the frontmost ship in your Vanguard (barrier last 20s and can negate DMG equal to 5.0% of the equipping character's max HP).
60240.name: Evasion Up

60250.desc: Once per battle, when equipped by an "Atelier Ryza" collab character: 50s after the battle starts, all your "Atelier Ryza" collab characters recover 5.0% of their max HP.
60250.name: HP Recovery

60260.desc: 核心驱动—天使的拥抱占用
60260.name: Core Drive - Angelic Embrace

60270.desc: Changes the BGM when equipped. If additional gear that changes the BGM is equipped at the same time, only a randomly chosen one will take effect.
60270.name: Glorious Melody

60280.desc: 道具2级共通buff-赋予5秒道具命中状态
60280.name: 道具命中

60281.desc: 道具2级共通buff-道具发动指示
60281.name: 道具发动

60290.desc: Creates a snowy landscape when equipped by Anchorage.
60290.name: Realm of Oneiric Snow

60300.desc: When equipped by Ting An: increases your Main Fleet's AVI by 10.0% (does not stack with the "Aviation Materials" skill).
60300.name: Type-Wu Seaplane

60310.desc: When equipped by a Northern Parliament ship: increases her LCK by 5 and, the first 3 times she takes DMG each battle, that DMG is reduced to 1.
60310.name: Fairy Magic

60320.desc: When equipped by Yat Sen: scatters plum petals in the breeze; for the first 5 battles every sortie: when the battle starts, deploys a barrier (lasts 30s) that can negate up to 5.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG.
60320.name: Plum-Petal Poetry

60330.desc: When equipped by Queen Elizabeth: she enters Rest Mode, recovering 3.0% of her max HP when she fires her Main Guns. When equipped by any other Royal Navy ship: with every odd-numbered volley Queen Elizabeth fires, she enters Work Mode, increasing all your Royal Navy ships' DMG dealt by 8.0% for 8s; after this effect ends, Queen Elizabeth enters Rest Mode.
60330.name: Her Majesty's Top-Secret Itinerary

60340.desc: When equipped by a Northern Parliament ship: increases her LCK by 3.
60340.name: Action Report - Frostfall

60350.desc: The ship with this gear equipped deals 5.0% more DMG against META ships.
60350.name: Watatsumi Research Notes

60360.desc: Able to hit underwater enemies (deals 35.0% DMG when hitting underwater enemies).
60360.name: Mark 35 Torpedo

60370.desc: A device that forecasts short-term weather changes. Increases the SPD of the ship equipping this gear by 2.
60370.name: Oasis Barometer

60380.desc: Increases airstrike DMG by 4.0%, but increases airstrike loading time by 4.0%.
60380.name: Precise Maintenance

60390.desc: When equipped by a Vanguard ship: the ship gains a special AA Gun during battle (only one special AA Gun may be active at a time).
60390.name: Additional Anti-Air Weaponry

60400.desc: When equipped by a DD: all the ship's Armor DMG modifiers increase by 15.0%.
60400.name: Improved Adaptability

60410.desc: Increases LCK by 2 when equipped on a ship.
60410.name: World Expo Commemorative Ticket

60420.desc: When equipped: activates a randomly chosen Command effect every 15s.
60420.name: Simulation Command

60430.desc: When equipped by a Sakura Empire ship: increases your Sakura Empire ships' LCK by 1 (does not stack).
60430.name: Embroidered Charm Pouch

60440.desc: During battle, increases the equipping ship's FP by 5.0% if there is an enemy within a radius of 20 units.
60440.name: Fly the Banner

60450.desc: Increases ASR by 1 for the boat equipping this gear.
60450.name: Nautical Telescope

60460.desc: Once per battle, when the ship with this gear's HP falls below 60.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 5.0% of that ship's max HP.
60460.name: Fruit Rations

60470.desc: Changes the battle music when equipped. If additional gear that changes the battle music is active at the same time, only a randomly chosen one will take effect.
60470.name: Shinobi Medal

60480.desc: The ship equipping this gear is treated as a Senran Kagura collab character.
60480.name: Shinobi Attire

60490.desc: When equipped by a Senran Kagura collab character: 30s after the battle starts, fires a special barrage from your Vanguard's frontmost ship (DMG is based on the FP stat of the ship equipping this gear; if equipped by a Senran Kagura submarine: performs this special barrage at the start of the battle instead).
60490.name: Ninjutsu Scroll

60500.desc: When equipped by Princeton: 8s after her airstrike finishes loading, launches an interceptive airstrike.
60500.name: Sea of Stars Area B20 Access Pass

101010.desc: If deployed with any other Neptunia ship, increases own damage by $1 and decreases own damage taken by 6.0%. For every other Neptunia ship deployed, further increases own damage by $2,and decreases own damage taken by 1.0%
101010.name: Protagonist Aura

101020.desc: Upon taking damage, $1 chance to increase own damage dealt by $2 for 8 seconds.
101020.name: Medistation S

101030.desc: If in the same fleet as Vert or Green Heart, increases own damage dealt by $1 and damage taken by $2. Otherwise, decreases own damage taken by $3 and damage dealt by $4.
101030.name: Power Break

101040.desc: For each Destroyer in the fleet, increases own reload by $2 and reduces damage taken from shelling by $1.
101040.name: Assam Link

101050.desc: Every $1 times the main gun is fired, the next main gun salvo will critically strike.
101050.name: Cross Combination

101060.desc: After 115 seconds in combat, unleashes a devastating barrage ($1). Can only activate once per combat.
101060.desc_get: Unleash an extremely powerful barrage 115 seconds after the start of battle. Power based on skill level. May only use once per battle.
101060.name: Victory Slash

101070.desc: $1 chance to activate every 20 seconds, fires a strong barrage ($2) that has a chance to set enemies on fire for 12 seconds.
101070.desc_get: Every 20 seconds, 20.0% chance (40.0% when fully upgraded) to launch a powerful barrage which may ignite hit enemy ships for 12 seconds. Power based on skill level.
101070.name: Blaze Break

101080.desc: Main gun shots will ignore enemies' armor type. Further increases main gun damage based upon skill level.
101080.name: Tricolor Order

101090.desc: $1 chance to activate every 20 seconds, fires a strong barrage ($2).
101090.desc_get: Every 20 seconds, 20.0% chance (40.0% when fully upgraded) to launch a powerful barrage. Power based on skill level.
101090.name: Lacy Dance

101100.desc: Each main gun hit increases own torpedo critical chance by $1, stacking up to 20 times. All stacks are consumed after firing torpedoes.
101100.name: Tänzerin Trombe

101110.desc: $1 chance to activate every 20 seconds, fires a strong barrage ($2) that has a chance to slow enemies for 8 seconds.
101110.desc_get: Every 20 seconds, 20.0% chance (40.0% when fully upgraded) to launch a powerful barrage. Reduce Speed of each enemy hit for 8 seconds.
101110.name: Getter Ravine

101120.desc: Every 15 seconds, switches between the following effects: 1) Reduces damage taken by $1, 2) Increases damage dealt by $2, 3) Restores $3 HP every 3 seconds.
101120.name: Darjeeling Rotation

101130.desc: $1 chance to activate every 20 seconds, launch a special airstrike ($2).
101130.desc_get: Every 20 seconds, 20.0% chance (40.0% when fully upgraded) to unleash an airstrike with special aviation. Power based on level.
101130.name: Rainy Ratnapura

104010.desc: Every 20s: this ship performs super A.I. hacking to decrease the FP, TRP, and AVI of all enemies by a large amount (up to $1) for 8s... Also has a small chance to accidentally increase the stats of all enemies instead.
104010.name: Kizuna Beam

104020.desc: When this ship takes DMG: $1 chance to fire a special torpedo barrage and avoid all enemy attacks for 3s. Once the effect ends: increases this ship's EVA by $2 for 3s.
104020.name: Crisis Prevention!

104030.desc: For each Kizuna AI in your fleet (excluding this ship) at the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP by $1 (can be stacked up to 4 times.) If there are no other Kizuna AIs in your fleet: decreases the DMG this ship takes by $2 for 30s after the battle starts.
104030.name: Connected

104040.desc: Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases the HE DMG it takes by $1.
104040.name: Everything Is In Order

104050.desc: 30s, 45s, and 60s after the start of the battle: launches a $1 special airstrike. Airstrike damage is based on the skill's level.
104050.name: Future Base

104060.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike while sortied with Kizuna AI: $1 chance for the Airstrike to deal double DMG.
104060.name: Melty World

104070.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by $1 but increases its Spread Range by 1. Every 16s after the start of the battle: $2 chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage damage is based on the skill's level.
104070.name: Super AIming Adjustments

104080.desc: Increases this ship's Accuracy and EVA by $1 through the use of advanced super A.I. tracking.
104080.name: Coercion Assistance Mode

105010.desc: Dive Bombers can be equipped in this ship's third gear slot, and will use the "Mach 2.42 Bermbew Sprawt" gear skin, but Airstrike load time increases by 100.0%. Every 20s: launches a $1 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's TRP stat.)
105010.name: Mach 2.42 Blossom

105020.desc: Increases this ship's FP by $1 at the start of the battle. If the fleet this ship is in has sunk 3 enemy fleets on the map: also increases this ship's TRP by $2.
105020.name: Two-Faced Fox

105030.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage that Burns enemies. DMG is based on the skill's level.
105030.name: Dream☆Story

105040.desc: Decreases DMG taken by Hololive ships by $2. Every 20s: for 8s, decreases the Speed of all onscreen enemies by $1, increases the Accuracy of all your ships by $1, and increases the Speed of all your Hololive ships by $1.
105040.name: Beneath the Deep Blue Sky

105050.desc: Decreases this boat's OXY by $1. For 20s after entering battle: increases this boat's DMG by $2. When this boat retreats from battle: increases its Speed by 100.0%.
105050.name: Shut-in Maid

105060.desc: When entering battle: applies 1 randomly chosen buff to your fleet. The buff's effect is increased to 150% for Hololive ships.
105060.name: Failen Angel

105070.desc: When entering battle: fires a special guaranteed $1 Critical Hit barrage. When there are 3 or more Hololive ships in the same fleet: improves the barrage.
105070.name: Promise to the Sunflower

105080.desc: Every 25s: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage.
105080.name: The Summer Flower We Watch

105090.desc: At the start of the battle: if there are an odd number of Hololive ships in your fleet: increases this ship's Main Gun DMG by $1. If their number is even: decreases the Main Gun DMG this ship takes by $2. 20s after the start of the battle: randomly chooses 1 of your ships and decreases the DMG they take by $2 for 10s.
105090.name: The Third Day of Flirting

105100.desc: Every 20s: $2 chance for this ship to buff itself using its spirits. When successfully procced: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $1. Can be stacked up to 3 times.
105100.name: Oni Goddess☆Nakiri

105110.desc: Every $1s: activates Demon Cutter Asura-Rakshasa $2 and gives this ship an 50.0% chance to inflict Armor Break (affected targets take more Main Gun DMG) to hit enemies for 6s. Slash DMG is based on the skill's level.
105110.name: Demon Cutter Asura-Rakshasa

105120.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to create a wave of light for 8s which decreases the DMG enemies deal by $2.
105120.name: The Wave of a Pleasant Dream

105130.desc: Every 8s: gain 1 MP. When this ship has accumulated 3 MP: fires a $1 special barrage, and resets MP to 0.
105130.name: MP Burst - Explosion

105140.desc: When this ship launches an odd-numbered Airstrike: launches an additional Torpedo Bomber airstrike $1. When launching an even-numbered Airstrike: launches an additional Dive Bomber airstrike $1. Airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.
105140.name: Wild Dualism

105150.desc: At the start of the battle: makes a divination that applies a randomly chosen $1 buff to this ship.
105150.name: Tarot Card Divination

106010.desc: After the battle starts: for 60s, increases this ship's FP and TRP by $3. When this ship takes DMG: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage that always crits (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between activations.)
106010.name: Rose's Thorns

106020.desc: Increases the DMG of this ship's first 3 torpedo launches of each battle by $1. When this ship fires its Torpedoes: for 8s, increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 and EVA by $2 for the ship in the frontmost position of your Vanguard.
106020.name: Vibrant Minuet

106030.desc: Increases this ship's FP by $1 and damage against Light Armor enemies by $3. 5s after this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a randomly chosen $2 barrage using special ammo.
106030.name: Rock-Paper-Cannon Salvo

106040.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: heals 2 random ships in your fleet for 5.0% of their max HP and, with a $1 chance, fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
106040.name: Super Mega Explosion

106050.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle, and every time this ship lands 6 hits with its Torpedoes: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
106050.name: Sakura Petal Dance

106060.desc: When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and RLD by $1 (can be stacked up to 3 times.) Additionally, after this ship sinks 3 enemies: increases this ship's Accuracy by $2 for the rest of the battle.
106060.name: Misty Mirror Flower

106070.desc: After the battle starts: for 60s, increases this ship's FP and its DMG against Light Armor enemies by $1. If there are other Venus Vacation characters in the same fleet: increases this ship's AA by $2 and decreases its Main Gun DMG taken by $3.
106070.name: Humble Part-Timer

106080.desc: Every 20s after the start of the battle: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Enemies hit by this barrage take $2 more DMG from Venus Vacation characters for 8s.
106080.name: Venus Friends

106090.desc: Every 18s after the start of the battle: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Enemies hit by this barrage take $3 more DMG from Misaki and Nagisa for 8s.
106090.name: Not-So-Gentle Sister

106100.desc: Decreases the DMG this ship takes by $1. When this ship fires its Main Guns: decreases the Speed of a random enemy by $2 for 8s.
106100.name: Venus' Unpredictability

106110.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a $1 barrage using special ammo and poker ammo (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Enemies hit by the special ammo take 10.0% increased DMG for 6s.
106110.name: Joker Card

106120.desc: Increases the Shell Velocity of this ship's equipped Main Gun by 10.0%. When 5 enemy aircraft are shot down within the fleet's AA range: increases this ship's TRP and AA by $1.
106120.name: Royal Flush

106130.desc: 5s after this ship finishes loading its Airstrike: launches a $1 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
106130.name: Dance of the Heavens

106140.desc: Increases this ship's DMG against BBs by $1. When this ship launches an Airstrike: $2 chance to decrease DMG taken for 8s by a random ship in your Vanguard.
106140.name: Hanakagura

106150.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional $1 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemies hit by this special airstrike suffer a minus 3.0% AA debuff and take $2 increased DMG from this ship for 6s.
106150.name: Scholar's Ocean Investigation

106160.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's AVI by $1. Decreases the loading time of this ship's first 2 airstrikes by 50.0%, but increases the loading time by 50.0% for the 3rd airstrike and onwards.
106160.name: Hunger After Work

106170.desc: When this ship is attacked: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage that always deals Critical DMG (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between activations). Enemies hit by this barrage take 15.0% more cannon and torpedo DMG from this ship for 5s (cannot be stacked). 60s after the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and TRP by $3.
106170.name: Rose's Thorns+

106180.desc: For the first 60s of battle: increases this ship's RLD by 15.0%; once this effect ends, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0% until the battle ends.
106180.name: Rose's Waltz

106190.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by $1. Decreases the loading time of this ship's first 2 airstrikes by 50.0%.
106190.name: Hunger After Work+

106200.desc: For the first 30s of battle: increases this ship's ACC by 10.0%; once this effect ends, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0% until the battle ends.
106200.name: Joyous Dinnertime

106210.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 2 random ships in your fleet recover 5.0% of their max HP and, with a $1 chance, fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
106210.name: Super Mega Explosion+

106220.desc: For the first 50s of battle: increases this ship's ACC by 10.0%; once this effect ends, this ship recovers 5.0% of her max HP.
106220.name: Fatal☆Delphinium

106230.desc: For the first 50s of battle: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0%; once this effect ends, this ship recovers 3.0% of her max HP.
106230.name: Brilliant Lapis

106240.desc: When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and RLD by $1 (can be stacked up to 3 times); once per battle, when she has sunk 3 enemies: increases this ship's ACC by $2 until the battle ends. When the battle starts, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: applies the above-mentioned ACC buff and increases this ship's DMG dealt by $3 until the battle ends.
106240.name: Misty Mirror Flower+

106250.desc: For the first 40s of battle: increases this ship's FP by 10.0%; once this effect ends, increases this ship's RLD by 10.0% until the battle ends.
106250.name: Souffle Attack

106260.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: targets a random enemy and reduces its SPD by $2 and EVA by $3 for 8s.
106260.name: Venus' Unpredictability+

106270.desc: For the first 40s of battle: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 10.0%; once this effect ends, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% until the battle ends.
106270.name: Tengu's Fan

106280.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt against BBs by $1. When this ship launches an airstrike: $2 chance to decrease the frontmost ship in your Vanguard's DMG taken by $3 for 8s.
106280.name: Hanakagura+

106290.desc: Increases the Shell Velocity of this ship's equipped Main Gun by 10.0%. When 5 enemy aircraft are shot down in your fleet's AA Range: increases your Vanguard's TRP and AA by $1.
106290.name: Royal Flush+

106300.desc: For the first 21s of battle: increases this ship's AA by 15.0%; once this effect ends, this ship's DMG dealt increases by 15.0% until the battle ends.
106300.name: Black Jack

106310.desc: For the first 30s of battle: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0%; once this effect ends, increases the AA of all your Venus Vacation collab characters by 15.0% until the battle ends.
106310.name: Iconic Direction

106320.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases all enemies' FP and TRP by $2. Every 16s: spawns a barrier (lasts 8s; can negate up to 3.0% of the recipient's max HP in DMG) around 2 random Venus Vacation collab characters. Sets this ship's Secondary Gun Range to 80 and, when she fires her Secondary Guns: decreases a random enemy's SPD by $1 for 3s (8s cooldown between activations).

106330.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by $1 and increases her FP and ACC by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to fire a $3 barrage that inflicts Armor Break to enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level).
106330.name: lisianthus Halation

106340.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by $1 and increases her FP and ACC by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to fire a $3 barrage that inflicts Armor Break to enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level). The first time each battle that this ship fires her Secondary Guns: also fires the above special barrage.
106340.name: lisianthus Halation +

106350.desc: For the first 60s of battle: restores 1.5% of this ship's max HP once every 10s; once this effect ends, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% until the battle ends.
106350.name: Delicious Crepes

106360.desc: 60s after the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and DMG dealt to Light Armor enemies by $1 and increases her cannon DMG dealt by $3. When the battle starts, if there is another Venus Vacation collab character in your fleet: increases this ship's AA by $2 and decreases her cannon DMG taken by $3.
106360.name: Humble Part-Timer+

107010.desc: Each second in combat, this ship has a 10.0% chance of dealing 43 DMG to herself; if this effect activates: after 3s, heals this ship and the lowest HP% ship in the fleet for $1 HP (this effect can only activate 2 times per battle).
107010.name: Cutesy Clumsy?

107020.desc: When this ship fires her #$1 wave of Torpedoes in a battle: increases all enemies' DMG taken by $2 for 5s. After this effect activates, when this ship fires her Torpedoes: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $3 until the end of the battle (can be stacked 2 times).
107020.name: An Idol's Ambitions

107030.desc: Every 15s: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
107030.name: Positivity Burst!

107040.desc: When this ship launches her first Airstrike in a battle: $1 chance (100.0% on subsequent Airstrikes) to launch a $2 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). At the start of the battle, if there is another The Idolmaster collab ship in your fleet: increases the first activation chance to 100.0%.
107040.name: Cerulean Song

107050.desc: When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's AVI and RLD by $1 until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 3 times). At the start of the battle, if there is another The Idolmaster collab ship in your fleet: adds 3 stacks of this buff.
107050.name: The Fruits of Labor

107060.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by $1. Decreases DMG taken by $2 for all The Idolmaster collab ships in your fleet.
107060.name: Alongside the Ocean's Wings

107070.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to Heavy Armor enemies by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to fire a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
107070.name: Iori Strike!

107080.desc: At the start of the battle: randomly chooses 1 other ship in your fleet and decreases her DMG taken by $2 for 30s. Once this effect wears off: heals that ship for $2 HP.
107080.name: Iori Defense!

107090.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: $1 chance to increase this ship's Main Gun DMG by 50.0% for 3s and AA by $2 for 5s. This effect may only activate once every 5s.
107090.name: Feigned Innocence?

107100.desc: As long as this ship is afloat: decreases your Main Fleet's DMG taken by $1. At the start of the battle: tells a fortune and receives one of the following effects: 1) Increases this ship's EVA by $2; 2) Increases this ship's Accuracy by $3; 3) Increases this ship's FP by $4; 4) Heals this ship for $5 HP.
107100.name: Healing Augury

107110.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If your Vanguard consists of only this ship when this barrage activates: this ship becomes lost and stops in place (Speed drops to 0) for 2s.
107110.name: Directionally Challenged

107120.desc: 5s after the battle starts, as well as every 20s: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemies hit by this barrage take $2 more DMG from The Idolmaster collab ships for 5s. At the start of the battle, if there are no more than 3 The Idolmaster collab ships in your fleet: increases this ship's FP by 100.0% and improves this barrage.
107120.name: Fleet Course Management

107130.desc: When this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases the time this ship Burns by 3s and decreases your Flagship's Burn DMG taken by $1, but also decreases this ship's Speed by 3.
107130.name: Logistics Buddy

107140.desc: When this boat enters the battle: decreases the Speed of a random ship in your Vanguard by 1 for 1s, then heals said ship for 100 HP and increases her EVA by $1 for 20s.
107140.name: Prankster's Cheer - Ami

107150.desc: At the start of the battle: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
107150.name: Double Trouble - Ami

107160.desc: When this boat enters the battle: decreases the Speed of a random ship in your Main Fleet by 1 for 1s, then heals said ship for 100 HP and increases her Accuracy by $1 for 20s.
107160.name: Prankster's Cheer - Mami

107170.desc: At the start of the battle: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
107170.name: Double Trouble - Mami

108010.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's FP by $1. Every 20s: fires a $2 Grid Beam (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has the Battle Tracto Max or Buster Borr equipped, or if this ship is sortied with Namiko or Hass: enhances this skill.
108010.name: Grid Beam

108020.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's AA by $1 and decreases her cannon DMG taken by $2. 5s after the battle starts, and every 30s: fires a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has the Gridman Calibur or Sky Vitter equipped, or if this ship is sortied with Namiko or Hass: enhances this skill.
108020.name: Slash & Circus

108030.desc: 40s after the battle starts: fires a $1 Grid Fixer Beam (DMG is based on the skill's level) and heals your fleet 3 times for 1.0% max HP per tick. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken: heals your fleet.
108030.name: Grid Fixer Beam

108040.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108040.name: Energy Pulse

108050.desc: Every 20s: activates "Instance Abreaction" and launches a $1 special airstrike (DMG is based on this ship's FP stat and the skill's level; airstrike deals cannon-type DMG).
108050.name: Instance Abreaction

108060.desc: Increases this ship's FP by $1. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and heals this ship 4 times for 2.0% max HP per tick.
108060.name: Ever-Burning Flame

108070.desc: Every 20s: executes a $1 Gridman Calibur slashing attack and spawns a shield that lasts 8s and can block up to 10 shots (slashing attack DMG is based on the skill's level).
108070.name: Calibur End

108080.desc: Enhances this ship's Secondary Guns using the Battle Tracto Max. Every 15s: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108080.name: Tanker Cannon

108090.desc: Every 10 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a $1 special missile barrage using the Buster Borr, and deploys a smokescreen that lasts 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level). When your ship(s) enters the smokescreen: puts out any normal Burn status ailment for that ship(s).
108090.name: Coordinated Volley

108100.desc: 5s after the battle starts, and with a $3 chance every 20s after that: fires a $1 laser barrage using the Sky Vittor, and increases this ship's AA by $2 (AA buff can be stacked up to 2 times per battle).
108100.name: Amp Laser Circus

108110.desc: Every 20 times this ship fires her Secondary Guns: fires a $1 Blazing Inferno Rex Roar (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108110.name: Blazing Inferno Rex Roar

108120.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's EVA by $1. Every 18s: fires a $2 beam using the Penetrator Gun which inflicts Armor Break to Heavy Armor enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108120.name: Something Beam

108130.desc: Every 10 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108130.name: Dynazenon Full Burst

108140.desc: This ship starts the battle with 1 Airstrike ready. Every battle, when this ship launches her 2nd Airstrike and onwards: launches an additional $1 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108140.name: Ride the Wind

108150.desc: Every battle, when this ship launches her 1st and 3rd Airstrikes: launches a $1 bombing raid using the Goldburn, and spawns a shield around your Vanguard that lasts 10s, reduces your Vanguard's DMG taken by 8.0%, and can block up to 15 shots (Goldburn DMG is based on the skill's level).
108150.name: Take to the Skies

108160.desc: Every 20s: uses $1 Instance Domination to seize control of Siren aircraft and make them attack enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level; aircraft deal cannon-type DMG).
108160.name: Instance Domination: Wings

108170.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: uses $1 Instance Domination to seize control of Siren weaponry and make them attack enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108170.name: Instance Domination: Flames

108210.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's FP by $1. Every 20s: fires a $2 Grid Beam (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has the Battle Tracto Max or Buster Borr equipped, or if this ship is sortied with Namiko or Hass: enhances the Grid Beam.
108210.name: Grid Beam+

108220.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108220.name: Energy Pulse+

108230.desc: Enhances this ship's Secondary Guns using the Battle Tracto Max. Every 15s: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108230.name: Tanker Cannon+

108240.desc: Every 6 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a $1 special missile barrage using the Buster Borr, and deploys a smokescreen that lasts 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level). When your ship(s) enters the smokescreen: puts out any normal Burn status ailment for that ship(s).
108240.name: Coordinated Volley+

108250.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's EVA by $1 and decreases the DMG taken by 8.0%. Every 18s: fires a $2 beam using the Penetrator Gun which inflicts Armor Break to Heavy Armor enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108250.name: Something Beam+

108260.desc: Every battle, when this ship launches her 1st and 3rd Airstrikes: launches a $1 bombing raid using the Big Goldburn, and spawns a shield around your Vanguard that lasts 10s, reduces your Vanguard's DMG taken by 8.0%, and can block up to 15 shots (Big Goldburn DMG is based on the skill's level).
108260.name: Take to the Skies+

108270.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: uses $1 Instance Domination to seize control of Siren weaponry and make them attack enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level).
108270.name: Instance Domination: Flames+

108280.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to perform a $3 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP stat).
108280.name: Sounderous Full Blast+

108290.desc: When the battle starts, and every 20s: increases this ship's and your frontmost Vanguard ship's FP and ACC by $1 for 10s (if the recipient is an SSSS collab character, instead increases FP and ACC by $2; effect does not stack if this ship is the frontmost ship). If this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $3, but decreases her SPD by 1.
108290.name: Hang in There!+

108300.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to perform a $3 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP stat).
108300.name: Sounderous Full Blast

108310.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by $1. Every 20s: performs a $2 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat) and restores $3 HP of one random ship in your Vanguard.
108310.name: Melodic Blaster

108320.desc: When the battle starts, and every 20s: increases this ship's and your frontmost Vanguard ship's FP and ACC by $1 for 10s (effect does not stack if this ship is the frontmost ship). If this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $2, but decreases her SPD by 1.
108320.name: Hang in There!

108330.desc: Every 10s: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); enemies hit by the barrage take $2 increased DMG from your SSSS collab characters.
108330.name: Promises, Love, and Expiration Dates

108340.desc: When equipped by Princess Hime: increases your SSSS collab characters' FP and TRP by 8.0%.
108340.name: Crab (With Receipt)

108350.desc: When equipped by Princess Hime: increases Princess Hime's, Yume Minami's, Chise Asukagawa's, The 2nd's, and Mujina's FP and AVI by 8.0%.
108350.name: Dragon Figurine

108410.desc: Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%. 3s after the battle starts: summons Gridman (Universe Fighter) to fight for 15s.
108410.name: Primal Accepter

108420.desc: 15s after the battle starts: summons Alexis Kerib (New Order) to fight for 30s.
108420.name: Confinement Program

108430.desc: Every battle, when this ship fires her 3rd Main Gun volley: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% until the battle ends.
108430.name: Battle Tracto Max Upgrade

108440.desc: Every battle, when this ship fires her 2nd wave of torpedoes: increases this ship's TRP by 12.0% until the battle ends.
108440.name: Buster Borr Upgrade

108450.desc: 15s after the battle starts: summons Dynazenon to fight for 15s. When the effect of "Primal Accepter" activates: if sortied with Chise Asukagawa who has the "Big Goldburn Zentangle" equipped: instead summons Rogue Kaiser Gridman, but for 15s, this ship and Rikka Takarada cannot attack and their skills cannot activate.
108450.name: Dyna Wing

108460.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI by 8.0%. If sortied with Rikka Takarada and Yume Minami: strengthens Gridman summoned by the skill "Primal Accepter".
108460.name: Big Goldburn Zentangle

108470.desc: 5s after the battle starts: uses Instance Domination to seize control of 2 Siren aircraft and make them attack enemies.
108470.name: Kaiju Seed

108480.desc: Every 25s: summons Kaiju Battleship Sounderous (Fortress Mode) to perform a supporting attack.
108480.name: Sounderous

108490.desc: Every 30s: summons Dynazenon to perform a supporting attack.
108490.name: Supporting Roar

109010.desc: When this ship's Item attack hits an enemy, if your fleet has 6 or more AP: consumes 6 AP and activates "Shining Blast" $1 (DMG is based on the skill's level; 3s cooldown between activations).
109010.name: Shining Blast

109020.desc: When sortied with one or more "Atelier Ryza" collab characters, makes their Item attacks stronger and increases their Crit Rate by $1; enemies who have been Item Marked take $2 more DMG from "Atelier Ryza" collab characters.
109020.name: Alchemy Teacher

109030.desc: Every 4 times this ship fires her Main Guns: your fleet gains 8 AP. Increases this ship's FP, AA, and EVA by $1.
109030.name: Grand Chariot

109040.desc: Every 4 times this ship fires her Main Guns: your fleet gains 10 AP. Increases this ship's FP, AA, and EVA by $1. The second time this ship's "Shining Blast" skill activates, activates "Fatal Drive - Grand Chariot" $2 (DMG is based on the level of this ship's "Grand Chariot" skill).
109040.name: Grand Chariot+

109050.desc: Every 10s, if your fleet has 10 or more AP: consumes 10 AP and activates "Frozen Lily" $1 (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemies hit by this skill are slowed by 15.0% for 5s.
109050.name: Frozen Lily

109060.desc: When the battle starts: your fleet gains 10 AP, all ships in your fleet recover $1 of their max HP, and all your "Atelier Ryza" collab characters recover an additional 2.0% of their max HP. When this ship launches an Airstrike: your Vanguard recovers $2 of their max HP and all your "Atelier Ryza" collab characters recover an additional 2.0% of their max HP. Once per battle, when a ship in your fleet falls below 30.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: that ship recovers $3 of her max HP and your fleet gains 10 AP.
109060.name: Blessed Melody

109070.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by $1. Every 8s: your fleet gains 8 AP.
109070.name: White Requiem

109080.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by $1. Every 8s: your fleet gains 8 AP. The second time this ship's "Frozen Lily" skill activates, activates "Fatal Drive - White Requiem" $2 (DMG is based on the level of this ship's "White Requiem" skill).
109080.name: White Requiem+

109090.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns, if your fleet has 10 or more AP: consumes 10 AP and activates "Red Flame Slash" $1 (DMG is based on the skill's level). The slashing part of this attack always deals Critical DMG; this ship recovers HP equal to $2 of the DMG dealt to the enemy.
109090.name: Red Flame Slash

109100.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by $2. Increases this ship's DMG dealt (by up to 20.0%) the lower her current HP is. Increases "Atelier Ryza" collab characters' Crit Rate by $1 against enemies who have been Item Marked. The first time one of your Main Fleet "Atelier Ryza" collab characters uses an AP-consuming skill: increases that skill's power.

109110.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by $1. Every 9s: your fleet gains 5 AP.

109210.desc: Every 6 times this ship fires her Secondary Gun, if your fleet has 10 or more AP: consumes 10 AP and activates "Dark Spirit" $1. When the battle starts, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard and there are other ships afloat in your Vanguard when "Dark Spirit" activates: adds a Dark Element to the ship in the rearmost position; if this ship is NOT in the frontmost position when "Dark Spirit" activates: adds a Dark Element to the ship in the frontmost position. When this attack activates, if there is only 1 enemy on the battlefield: this attack deals guaranteed Crit DMG. $4
desc_add: ,If this special attack sinks an enemy: performs Twin Blades - Followup Slash again (10s cooldown between activations).
desc_get_add: ,If this special attack sinks an enemy: performs Twin Blades - Followup Slash again (10s cooldown between activations).

Restores this ship's HP equal to 12.0% of the DMG dealt by this attack.
When this attack activates, if there is only 1 enemy on the battlefield: this attack deals guaranteed Crit DMG.

desc_get_add: ,If Hanzō-Style Full Bloom sinks an enemy: additionally performs Twin Blades - Followup Slash 3 times.

1090150.desc: Increases this boat's surface combat duration by $1s. When this boat fires her Main Guns: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
1090150.name: Surface Combat - Surcouf

1090160.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: $1 chance to fire again and restore 2.0% of this ship's max HP.
1090160.name: Double Gun - Suffolk

1090170.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP shells by $1. 10s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that: deploys a barrier (lasts 10s) that can negate up to $2 of this ship's max HP in DMG; when this barrier breaks or expires: fires a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
1090170.name: AP Protection - Mogami

1090180.desc: Increases this ship's FP and AVI by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns or launches an airstrike: 50.0% chance to fire a $2 special barrage forwards (DMG is based on the skill's level).
1090180.name: Cover Fire – Fusou

1090190.desc: Increases FP by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to double the DMG dealt by that attack. Every 10s: fires a $3 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level)
1090190.name: Focused Assault - Takao

1090200.desc: When this ship fires her torpedoes: $1 chance to fire a second wave of torpedoes and reduces the reload time of currently reloading torpedoes by 3s.
1090200.name: Double Torpedo - McCall

1090210.desc: Every 15s: $1 chance for this ship to evade all attacks for 8s. If this effect does not activate: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0% for 8s.
1090210.name: Emergency Maneuvers - Fortune

1090220.desc: Increases your Vanguard's RLD by $1 (does not stack with the same skill). Every 20s: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
1090220.name: Reload Command - Königsberg
